title: Hello Blockchain!
content: Just deployed my first smart contract 🧠🚀

title: GM frens
content: Woke up, sipped chai, and checked gas fees. Typical dev morning.

title: Bugged out 🐞
content: Spent 3 hours debugging an issue caused by a missing semicolon. Send help.

title: Dark mode supremacy
content: If your app doesn’t have dark mode, does it even exist?

title: Throwback Thursday
content: Remember when we used jQuery for *everything*?

title: Gasless days
content: Dreaming of a world where transactions cost nothing 😩

title: Late night commits
content: Pushed code at 3 AM. Hope it works in the morning 🤞

title: Profile pic updated!
content: Finally found a picture where I don’t look like I just debugged for 5 hours.

title: Tip of the Day 💡
content: Always lint before you push. Your team will thank you.

title: ZK what?
content: Diving into zero-knowledge proofs and my brain is doing gymnastics.
